name: Tok Gock
description:
A tiny game I made with my 8 year old niece. All creative and design decisions are hers, I just helped a bit with the programming part :)

How to play:

Use the arrow keys or click/tab on the screen to move to rooster. Chase the chickens into their coop. Avoid the nets.

Used assets:

  • "Chicken Sound Effect", by IMadeIt, CC-BY 3.0.
  • "Choco Bird's Run", by Bobjt, CC-BY 3.0.
  • "Chicken Sprites", by Shepardskin, CC0.
